notice1_1.message: この Chrome 拡張で提供されるネットワークのブロックと許可のルールは、chrome.declarativeNetRequest API を利用しており、そのAPIがもつ制限が適用されます。制限についての詳細は API リファレンスの

notice_2.message: この拡張機能の作者(dash14.ack)は、この Chrome 拡張の使用によって生じたいかなる損失及び損害に対しても一切の責任を負いません。

AddARuleSet.message: ルールセットを追加する

RemoveTheRuleSet.message: ルールセットを削除する

remove_confirmation.message: 本当に削除してよろしいですか？

explain_condition.message: 全て任意項目ですが、少なくとも1つは指定が必要です。

RequestDomains.message: リクエスト先ドメイン

InitiatorDomains.message: イニシエータドメイン

hint_InitiatorDomains_1.message: Specify the origination of the request as a comma-separated list.

hint_InitiatorDomains_2.message: The rule will only match network requests originating from the list of initiator domains. If the list is empty, the rule is applied to requests from all domains.

hint_InitiatorDomains_note_1.message: This matches against the request initiator and not the request url.

hint_UseRegex_1.message: Regular expression to match against the network request url. This follows the

hint_UseRegex_note_1.message: The regexFilter must be composed of only ASCII characters. This is matched against a url where the host is encoded in the punycode format (in case of internationalized domains) and any other non-ascii characters are url encoded in utf-8.

hint_UseRegex_note_2.message: The total number of regex rules of each type cannot exceed 1000.

hint_UseRegex_note_3.message: Each rule must be less than 2KB once compiled. This roughly correlates with the complexity of the rule. If you try to load a rule that exceeds this limit, you will see a warning like the one below and the rule will be ignored.

hint_UseRegex_note_3_message.message: rules_1.json: Rule with id 1 specified a more complext regex than allowed as part of the "regexFilter" key.

hint_RequestDomains_1.message: Specify the domains in the request url as a comma-separated list.

hint_RequestDomains_2.message: The rule will only match network requests when the domain matches one from this list. If the list is omitted, the rule is applied to requests from all domains.

hint_Domains_note_2.message: The entries must consist of only ascii characters.

hint_Domains_note_3.message: Use punycode encoding for internationalized domains.

hint_Domains_note_4.message: Sub-domains of the listed domains are also matched.

hint_RequestMethods_1.message: List of HTTP request methods which the rule can match.

hint_RequestMethods_note_1.message: Specifying a requestMethods rule condition will also exclude non-HTTP(s) requests.

hint_ResourceTypes_1.message: List of resource types which the rule can match.

MatchedRulesInTabs.message: タブ内でマッチしたルール (5分以内)
